pr_title: Fix issue with item crack particle not working

timeline.message:
Revert "Introducing block state modification"

This reverts commit 05be9066
VisualEffect - fix issue with ITEM_CRACK particles not working

timeline.bodyText: Even if this Material didn't change between versions, it might be better to have a constant with Aliases.javaItemtype("iron sword") and use ItemType#getMaterial here, just to avoid referencing the enum in general.
timeline.author: FranKusmiruk

replies.bodyText: Good idea... never know what is going to happen in the future.
replies.author: ShaneBeee

timeline.message:
VisualEffect - add regression test
- I know its small, but theres not much more i can do here.
VisualEffect - use alias/ItemType instead of Material

timeline.bodyText: I think this could be a private final static constant for the class
timeline.author: Wealthyturtle

replies.bodyText:
If it were, id have to clone it each time its used. In that case its the same as creating a new item stack.
Unless I were to make a final private static ItemType then use getRandom within this method.
Thoughts?
replies.author: ShaneBeee

replies.bodyText: https://github.com/SkriptLang/Skript/blob/master/src/main/java/ch/njol/skript/expressions/ExprSkull.java I'm not sure, but other components of Skript do it like that
replies.author: Wealthyturtle

replies.bodyText: Cloning might be marginally cheaper than constructing the ItemType again, not that it really matters on this case though.
replies.author: FranKusmiruk

replies.bodyText: Im going to leave it as is. As snow said it won't really matter here.
replies.author: ShaneBeee
